title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 641.4 - Recording officer defined
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 641.4 - Recording officer defined

State Regulations

Recording officer means the county clerk of the county, except in a county having a register or registrar, where it means the register
or registrar of the county, or in the City of New York, where it means the city
register. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
641.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
